snippet: Let’s help states with health care online enrollment problems, not impugn their efforts, as Republicans are doing.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Republicans for their cynical attempt to capitalize on problems in certain state-run health care exchanges that have slowed enrollment and left some without insurance; calls on Republicans to end harassment and instead focus on getting coverage for those in need.
lead_paragraph: Let’s help states with health care online enrollment problems, not impugn their efforts, as Republicans are doing.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
